arts.ttl: Louis Buffon scores first goal for Czech Republic U18 side
arts.sum: Louis Buffon, the son of Italy legend Gianluigi Buffon, has just scored his first goal...

arts.ttl: Vladimír Coufal on West Ham frustration, great Fulham offer, and Everton transfer
arts.sum: West Ham United’s Vladimír Coufal has left the door open to join Everton after being frustrated over a failed move to Fulham. The right-back is currently with the Czech Republic, preparing for the World Cup qualifier against Gibraltar later today. Tuesday’s edition of MF DNES has published an interview with the 32-year-old, during which he The post Vladimír Coufal on West Ham frustration, great Fulham offer, and Everton transfer appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Is Bayer Leverkusen's Patrik Schick the Bundesliga's form striker?
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's Harry Kane leads the 2024/25 Bundesliga scoring charts, but Bayer Leverkusen counterpart Patrik Schick is arguably the most in-form striker in the division. Schick sits second in the current charts, with 17 goals from 23 appearances at a clip of one every 68 minutes - the best strike rate in the division.

arts.ttl: Kovar's Leverkusen future uncertain as replacements are lined up
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso's team could look to bolster their squad in summer with a new goalkeeper.

arts.ttl: Matej Kovar allowed to leave Bayer Leverkusen in the summer – Manchester City’s Stefan Ortega and SC Freiburg’s Noah Atubolu potential replacements
arts.sum: Kölner Stadt Anzeiger reports that Bayer Leverkusen’s number two Matej Kovar will be allowed to leave the club in the summer. Since joining in the summer of 2023, Kovar has failed…

arts.ttl: Schick casts doubt on Leverkusen future
arts.sum: Patrik Schick has left his future with Bayer Leverkusen open.
